https://postimg.org/image/p9kulykod/

 

The texture has this line. I mean, it doesn't blend well. I don't know how to explain it but I'm guessing you can see it for yourself. Hopefully somebody can help me with this!

Somebody reading this? I have waited for a long time...

Can you please post your texture file? It looks like the edges of your texture don't line up which cuases a seam on the planet

Edited March 18, 2017 by AceCrafted

Unfortunately, because I waited months for someone to reply, I don't have the file anymore. But I'm working on my own system and as soon as I have made a texture again, I will make sure to post it here!

That's great. Good luck with your system!

A way to prevent this is to create your textures through PQS mods with kopernicus and then edit them in game with Kittopia.  @The White Guardian has a guide for how to do this

I disagree, gas giant textures cannot be created from PQS.

Here's what I would do:

1 open the texture in Photoshop or GIMP

2 With the rectangular selection tool, grab the left half of the image, copy it to the clipboard then press delete, and paste the copied half into a new layer.

3. Swap the positions of the left and right halves, then merge the layers down.

4. The texture issue should be obvious now. At this point you can edit it out manually.

Or you can just offset (filter>other>offset) the image and fix the seam with a mixture of clone tool/blur tool. Much easier than splitting an image.
